Equipped with 2 CCS-2 connectors, and intelligent design, Statiq DC Charger ensures the fastest charging for your EV. Join the EV revolution with our DC 60kW Dual Gun Charger. Auto Cut-off IP54 Certified IOT enabled WiFi Enabled Bluetooth Enabled RFID enabled SMART CHARGING Enables the simultaneous charging of two vehicles with a dynamic load-sharing mode, providing an output power of either 60 kW or 30 kW. Full color sunlight-readable high-resolution touchscreen display SIMPLE CHARGING Convenient indicator for charging status Visibility during the night with sidelights SAFE CHARGING Incorporating remote commissioning and debugging capabilities that enable the remote monitoring, diagnosis, and repair of the charger. Statiq DC 60kW fast charger using which you can charge your 4Wheeler EV (with CCS2 connector) How long does it take to charge my vehicle ? Although charging time varies from vehicle to vehicle, Statiq 60kW fast charger can charge any electric 4-wheeler with 35-50mins. Where can I install Statiq DC 60 kW Charger? Statiq 60kW Dual gun charger is an aesthetically pleasing charger and enhances the look and feel of your property, it can be installed anywhere from homes to office spaces to malls, resort and hotels and highway outlets. Does Statiq take care of the installation ? We have an Installation and commissioning team which will support you with installation and also teach you on how to operate the charger.
